channel.title: Gpt4all on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Gpt4all on Arrans github.io

item.title: mudler/LocalAI
item.description: 🤖 The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more models architectures. Features: Generate Text, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P inference

item.title: getumbrel/llama-gpt
item.description: A self-hosted, offline, ChatGPT-like chatbot. Powered by Llama 2. 100% private, with no data leaving your device. New: Code Llama support!

item.title: gotzmann/llama.go
item.description: llama.go is like llama.cpp in pure Golang!
